name: GRUESOME GRAVEYARD
description:
GRUESOME GRAVEYARD is a halloween special project originaly made with scratch 3.0. In this game, you are a little human with a sword twice as big as you. Kill undead monsters and pumpkins...

...or DIE. You basically have to protect your character.

Art by Krishna Palacio on Itch, music found on Itch.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys to move, move your mouse to swing your sword.
